publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-615 Trish Godman: Moratorium on the Death Penalty—That the Parliament supports the Amnesty 2000 Project which calls upon all legislatures throughout the world to introduce a moratorium on the death penalty this year.
S1M-615 Moratorium on the Death Penalty (lodged on 1 March 2000) Michael Russell*

S1M-615 Trish Godman: Moratorium on the Death Penalty—That the Parliament supports the Amnesty 2000 Project which calls upon all legislatures throughout the world to introduce a moratorium on the death penalty this year. Supported by: Michael Russell, Shona Robison*

S1M-615 Moratorium on the Death Penalty (lodged on 1 March 2000) Irene McGugan*, Margaret Jamieson*, Robert Brown*, Scott Barrie*
S1M-615 Moratorium on the Death Penalty (lodged on 1 March 2000) Cathy Peattie*, Tommy Sheridan*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*

S1M-615 Trish Godman: Moratorium on the Death Penalty—That the Parliament supports the Amnesty 2000 Project which calls upon all legislatures throughout the world to introduce a moratorium on the death penalty this year. Supported by: Michael Russell, Shona Robison, Linda Fabiani, Andrew Wilson, Rhoda Grant, Irene McGugan, Margaret Jamieson, Robert Brown, Scott Barrie, Cathy Peattie, Tommy Sheridan, Mr Kenneth Macintosh, Alex Neil*, Donald Gorrie*
